article_title: Over 1,200 Plans Covering Almost 4 Million People

article_metadata.description: With names like "Mini-Meds," "Discount Health Cards," "Medical Discount Plans" and "Fixed Benefit Indemnity Plans," they sort of sound like health insurance. In fact, that's exactly how they were marketed and sold – often on late night television. One such company called HealthcareOne LLC had a particularly effective TV ad that pushed "A Real [...]
